comment.text: The translation key "ProviderURLTooltip" is used to display a tooltip for the "Issuer URL" label in the Single Sign On settings page, helping users understand the purpose of entering an entity ID. This tooltip appears next to a field where users can enter a provider's URL.

usage.context:
<SsoFormField
 labelText={t("ProviderURL")}
 name="entityId"
 placeholder={PROVIDER_URL}
 tabIndex={5}
 tooltipContent={<Text fontSize="12px">{t("ProviderURLTooltip")}</Text>}
 tooltipClass="provider-url-tooltip icon-button"
 value={entityId}
 hasError={entityIdHasError}
 dataTestId="entity_id"
 />

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'مزود' can be written as 'مُزَوِّد' with diacritics to clearly indicate the vowel sounds. While understandable without them, it's best practice for accuracy.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: مُزَوِّد

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'جهة' can be written as 'جِهَة' with diacritics.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: جِهَة

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "İdentifikasiya Provayderi Müəssisə ID-si (URL verən)" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Identity Provider Entity Id (Issuer URL)". "Müəssisə ID-si" translates to "Establishment ID" which isn't the intended meaning. "URL verən" is a literal translation of 'URL provider', and isn't idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more accurate translation such as "Tək Giriş İdentifikasiya Provayderi Vəziyyət ID-si (Buraxan URL)" or "Tək Giriş İdentifikasiya Provayderi Müəssisəsinin ID-si (Buraxan URL)". The most important thing is to convey the concept of 'Issuer' or 'Entity ID'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The parentheses are unnecessarily disruptive. A more fluid sentence structure would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove or rework the parentheses to create a smoother sentence.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Идентификация на обекта на доставчика на самоличност (URL адрес на издателя)" is a bit literal and slightly awkward. "Entity Id" is a specific technical term that doesn't always translate directly. While technically correct, it might not be the most natural phrasing for a tooltip.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Препоръчвам нещо по-просто като: "ИД на доставчика на самоличност (URL на издателя)" or "URL на доставчика на самоличност (Издател)"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The parentheses around "(URL адрес на издателя)" are a little clunky in Bulgarian.  Consider how tooltips are formatted in the application and match that style.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing the parentheses or adjusting their placement to improve readability. Example: "Идентификация на обекта на доставчика на самоличност – URL адрес на издателя"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Identita subjektu poskytovatele identit (adresa URL vydavatele)' is a bit literal and could be improved for clarity and naturalness in Czech. 'Identita subjektu' is overly technical and 'vydavatele' (issuer) is understandable but not the most common phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Provider identity (Issuer URL)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of parentheses is not ideal and can be simplified. Consistent phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Provider identity (Issuer URL) – or even better, 'URL poskytovatele identity'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ID des Identitätsanbieters (URL des Ausstellers)' doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'Identity Provider Entity Id (Issuer URL)'. While 'ID des Identitätsanbieters' is accurate for 'Identity Provider Entity Id', '(URL des Ausstellers)' is a less common and potentially confusing way to translate 'Issuer URL'.  'Aussteller' can imply a broader concept.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ID des Identitätsanbieters (URL des Herausgebers)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Entity Id' is not accurately translated. 'Οντότητας' (Ontotitas) is correct for 'Entity,' but 'Αναγνωριστικό' (Anagnoristikó) is a bit formal and literal for 'Id' in this context. A more natural translation for 'Entity Id' would be 'Αναγνωριστικό Οντότητας'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Αναγνωριστικό Οντότητας

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Issuer URL' is literally translated as 'URL εκδότη' which is understandable but slightly awkward. 'Issuer' implies a source or provider. A more fluent option would be to convey this meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL παρόχου

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Identiteetin tarjoajan entiteetti Id (Myöntäjän URL)' is a literal translation and doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'Identity Provider Entity Id (Issuer URL)'.  'Entiteetti Id' is overly technical for a tooltip. 'Myöntäjän URL' is a reasonable translation for 'Issuer URL' but the whole phrase is clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tarkempi käännös voisi olla 'Tunnistuspalvelimen osoite' or 'Tunnistuspalvelun URL'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The inclusion of the English term 'Entity Id' within the Finnish translation disrupts the natural flow and readability. It's better to avoid mixing languages, especially in tooltips.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove 'Entity Id' and only use the Finnish translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "Identity Provider Entity Id" is not directly equivalent to "Ինքնության տրամադրող միավորների Id". A more accurate translation would convey the meaning of 'Identity Provider' as a service or organization, rather than just the 'units' or 'elements'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "Համակայության ծառայողության ԲՀՄ (էմիտենտի URL)" or "Համակայության ծառայողության ԲՀՄ (ներկայացուցչի URL)" . The abbreviations BHM and emitent/nerqayutsich are commonly used.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of parentheses around "(Թողարկողի URL)" feels slightly awkward in Armenian. It could be more naturally integrated into the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider integrating the URL directly into the sentence: "Ինքնության տրամադրող միավորների Id, Թողարկողի URL" or "Ինքնության տրամադրող միավորների Id - Թողարկողի URL".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes parentheses and the abbreviation 'URL' without prior explanation or consistent formatting with the English version. While 'URL' is understandable, it might benefit from a more formal Italian equivalent or maintaining the English abbreviation consistently.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a full Italian equivalent for 'URL' (e.g., 'indirizzo web') or consistently use the English abbreviation if brevity is desired. For example, 'ID entità del provider di identità (indirizzo web dell’emittente)'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Entity Id' is not accurately translated. 'Vietrādis' implies a broadcast or distribution point, which doesn't align with the technical meaning of 'Entity Id'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Identitātes nodrošinātāja identifikators (izdevēja URL)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'entītijas' has a spelling error. It should be 'identifikators'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: identifikators

ai_spell_check_issues.description: 'Uitgever' is a direct translation of 'Publisher', not 'Issuer'. The intended meaning of 'Issuer URL' is a provider that authenticates users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Identity Provider Entity Id (Emitter URL)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Adresa URL a emitentului' is a literal translation of 'Issuer URL' and might be confusing for users. 'Emitent' doesn't fully capture the technical meaning of 'Issuer' in this context. A more accurate term would be 'Autoritate de Emitere' or 'Furnizor de Certificate'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ID-ul de entitate al furnizorului de identitate (Autoritatea de Emitere)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Entity Id' is not accurately translated. 'Идентификатор сущности' is a literal translation that might not be immediately clear to a Russian-speaking user. A more user-friendly translation might be 'Уникальный идентификатор' or 'Идентификатор'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Уникальный идентификатор поставщика учетных записей (URL-адрес поставщика)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The parentheses around 'URL-адрес поставщика' are not consistently applied in the entire product's terminology. It's recommended to ensure consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider if parentheses are needed around 'URL-адрес поставщика' throughout the product and maintain consistency.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'අනන්‍යතා ප්‍රතිපාදකයාගේ හැඳු. (නිකුත්කරුගේ ඒ.ස.නි.).' is not a fully accurate translation of 'Identity Provider Entity Id (Issuer URL)'. While 'අනන්‍යතා ප්‍රතිපාදකයාගේ හැඳු.' correctly translates 'Identity Provider Entity Id', the '(නිකුත්කරුගේ ඒ.ස.නි.)' is a literal translation of 'Issuer URL' that might be confusing or not easily understood by a Sinhala speaker. A more natural translation of 'Issuer URL' in this context would be something more descriptive, like 'නිකුත්කරු ලිපිනය'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider revising '(නිකුත්කරුගේ ඒ.ස.නි.)' to something like 'නිකුත්කරු ලිපිනය' or a similar phrasing that clarifies it is the URL.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of parentheses around 'නිකුත්කරුගේ ඒ.ස.නි.' feels abrupt and disrupts the flow of the sentence.  While parentheses are sometimes used, they aren't necessary here and reduce readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the parentheses around '(නිකුත්කරුගේ ඒ.ස.නි.)' and integrate the term more naturally within the sentence, if the 'නිකුත්කරු ලිපිනය' suggestion is adopted.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Issuer URL" as "URL vydavateľa" is technically correct but not idiomatic. 'Vydavateľa' directly translates to 'issuer', but in this context, a more common and natural phrasing would be 'URL zdroja identity' or 'URL poskytovateľa identity'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider revising to 'URL zdroja identity' or 'URL poskytovateľa identity'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "Issuer URL" is not accurately translated. "Izdajatelja" implies 'issuer' in a financial sense, while 'Issuer URL' refers to the Entity ID of the Identity Provider.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ID ponudnika identitete (URL entitete)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the term "ID ponudnika identitete" is a long phrase. Consider whether a shorter, more natural Slovenian alternative exists, if context allows. Otherwise, keeping the term consistent with other translations is more important.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'Identitete ponudnika' or 'ID ponudnika' depending on the broader context and existing terminology.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Entitet IdP-а (URL издаваоца)' is not the most natural or accurate translation of "Identity Provider Entity Id (Issuer URL)". While it conveys the meaning, 'Entitet' is not the most common term for 'Entity' in this context. 'Издаваоца' is correct for 'Issuer' but the entire phrasing feels a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ИДП ентитет (URL издаваоца)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'IdP-а' suggests an abbreviation but the original uses 'Identity Provider' spelled out. While abbreviation is acceptable, consistency is key.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider maintaining consistency with 'ИДП ентитет' if abbreviations are acceptable, or using 'Идентитет Провајдера' for greater clarity.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Entitet IdP-a (URL izdavaoca)' doesn't fully convey the meaning of 'Identity Provider Entity Id (Issuer URL)'. 'Entitet' is a vague term. 'Issuer URL' specifically refers to the entity identifier used for authentication.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Identifikacioni ID Davalca Identiteta (URL Davalca)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'IdP-a' is unconventional. It's preferable to use a more standardized term or clarify the abbreviation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP (URL Davalca)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Kimlik Sağlayıcı Varlık Kimliği (Sağlayıcı URL)' is a literal translation and might not be the most natural or understandable phrasing for a tooltip. 'Entity Id' and 'Issuer URL' are technical terms that might benefit from a more user-friendly explanation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kimlik Sağlayıcı Adresi (Yayıncı URL)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, including both 'Kimlik Sağlayıcı' and 'Sağlayıcı' might be redundant. It could be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kimlik Sağlayıcı Varlık Kimliği (URL)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Id nhà cung cấp thực thể (IdP) (URL nhà phát hành)' is not a precise translation of 'Identity Provider Entity Id (Issuer URL)'. 'Nhà phát hành' translates more accurately to 'Issuer', not 'Publisher'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Id thực thể nhà cung cấp danh tính (IdP) (URL nhà phát hành)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The addition of 'IdP' in parentheses is unnecessary and disrupts the flow of the translation.  The English does not include an abbreviation in the tooltip.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Id thực thể nhà cung cấp danh tính (URL nhà phát hành)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '发布者 URL' for 'Issuer URL' is not the most accurate or common rendering in Chinese IT contexts. '发布者' directly translates to 'publisher', which isn't the standard terminology for 'Issuer' in the context of Identity Providers. A more appropriate translation would be '颁发者 URL'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 颁发者 URL
